name: Michael Erdmann's Respositories
body:
# Introduction
I am using this page to communicate a few things about my public repositories 

## Collaboration

The collaboration project provides a small frame work which enables you to apply your multiple core CPU's to partitionable tasks. A partition is a subset of your input data which can be processed from other partitions. Therefor by applying multiple CPU's in parallel processing independent partitions a speed up of processing time can be achieved.  

Some examples can be found [here](http://www.michaelslab.net/software/computing/index.html)

## bb-examples

This example contains application examples for the beagle bone boards.

## Huygens
The objective of this project was to find a reasonable tool set for presenting data graphically. During the cause of this project id some experiments with such tools. The results is being shown on the [project page](http://www.michaelslab.net/ci.php/huygens)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
